item.description: A deal-hunting mindset, volatile weather and election distraction could influence holiday spending this year.

item.title: Stock futures slip after S&P 500's sixth straight weekly advance: Live updates
item.description: The Dow Jones Industrial Average and S&P 500 on Friday registered their sixth straight weekly advance, this year's best for both benchmarks.

item.title: 10-year Treasury yield rises above 4.11% as investors monitor Fed speeches
item.description: The U.S. 10-year Treasury yield rose above 4.11% on Monday as investors awaited a flurry of speeches from Federal Reserve policymakers.

item.title: Elon Musk offers $1 million a day to entice swing state voters to sign petition
item.description: Elon Musk said he will give away $1 million daily until Election Day to registered voters in swing states who sign his America PAC petition.
